All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccidentalyTargeted
main class for a state of the game accidentally targeted
AdditionalVoiceLineToMainMenu
main class for a state of the game in the main menu
Apply
driver when the state of the game is at apply state
BadEnding
sets menu UI state when the bad ending is met
BaseRequirements
sets the bounds of the base jframe which implements FrameGetter
BookAppointment
main class for a state of the game book appointment
ButtonGetter
creates interface ButtonGetter.
ButtonPropertiesGetter
interface ButtonPropertiesGetter
CenterText
creates interface CenterText
ChoiceDeterminer
creates interface ChoiceDeterminer
CommandFactory
parent class for polymorphism extends to several classes applies and the values from the subclasses in this class
ConnectToPresident
main class for a state of the game ConnectToPresident inherits the methods from superclass CommandFactory and ChoiceDeterminer interface
ContactRepresentative
class when game state is contact rep
CountDownClock
class for the seven minute timer inherits abstract methods from interface FrameGetter and FrameCloser
CreateBigFontLabel
UI blueprint for big fonts splash texts inherits methods and variables from CreateJLabel and SetComponentFont
CreateJButton
blueprint for button creation extends BaseRequirements and implements ButtonGetter
CreateJFrame
creates the window
CreateJLabel
used to display texts
CreateMediumFontLabel
for medium sized fonts
CreateNormalButton
creates a normal button
CreateSmallFontLabel
creates a small font label
CreateTelephoneButton
creates a telephone button
CreateTextField
creates text field to receive inputs from buttons
DefensiveWeapons
class when game state is at defensive weapons
Dialogue
dialogue class which sets the file name and returns the path to the file
DisableButton
interface for singular button disabling
DisableMultipleButtons
interface for multiple button disabling
EmergencyCannotWait
class when game state is at emergency cannot wait
EnterSpecialCode
class when game state is at enter special code
FastMissile
class when game state is at fast missile
FrameCloser
interface for frame closing
FrameGetter
interface for JFrame
FrameInitializer
interface for fram initialization
Game
main UI for the base game which implements FrameGetter and FrameInitializer
GameDataInitializer
game data interface initializer
GameDetailsInitializer
initializes game details
GameFileNameInitializer
initializes game files
GoodEnding
sets the UI once the good ending is met
GoToAnotherDialogue
interface for jumping to another dialogue
GroupDisable
group disable change of states
Hemisphere
class when game state is at hemisphere
HighRanking
class when game state is at hihg ranking
Home
class during the start of the game uses the classes which constitute the UI
HotlineVerification
class when game state is at hotline verification
InitializeButtons
interface for subclasses which deal with button initialization
InterceptionMethods
class when game state is at interception methods
InvalidCodeMultipleAttempt
class when game state is at multiple attempt invalid
Main
main class
MainMenu
class when game state is at main menu start game state
MessageFrame
creates the MessageFrame class which implements from a few interfaces sets the UI characteristics
Missile
class when game state is at missile
MultipleButtonClickable
interface for enabling and clickable buttons
NeedPermission
class when game state is at need permission
NorthHemisphere
class when game state is at north hemisphere
NuclearChoice
class when game state is at nuclear choice
NuclearProgram
class when game state is at nuclear program
ObjectMovable
interface for movable objects
OtherMatters
class when game state is at other matters
PlayAudio
plays the audio in the background
ReallySure
class when game state is at really sure
SetBackground
background ui interface
SetComponentColor
interface for component color
SetComponentFont
blueprint for the font appearance
SingleButtonClickable
interface for clickable single buttons
Speed
class when game state is at speed
StaticData
houses all the static data the package needs such as the game data between states, asset file names,and provides methods for getting the audio file for each state
StaticData.GameData
game data class which measures each state of the game
StaticData.GameDetails
ui window
StaticData.GameFileNames
class which has the file names as constant strings used in Dialogue class
Telephone
creates and adds functionality to the telephone ui
TextFieldGetter
interface creation
TextSetter
sets text interface
ToContinue
class when game state is at to continue
TradeDeals
class when game state is at trade deals
TypesOfWeapons
class when game state is at types of weapons
